Function Documentation

get_center ( img  ,
img_height  ,
img_width  ,
low  ,
high  ,
old   
)

Function to get the center of the coloured disk

Parameters:
imgSnapshot containing the
img_heightImage height
img_widthImage width
lowLower limits of the [R,G,B] values of the disk
highHigher limits of the [R,G,B] values of the disk
oldThe B/W image on which the circle is to be shown
Returns:
center The [x,y] coordinates of the center of the disk
new The new B/W image showing the disk
